alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:10PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Blowing snow from wind gusts of up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Western Canyonlands
